Class: Axis

Axis(_typeEnum, _boundBegin, _boundEnd, _progression)

Axis manages one hyperparameter over the course of the search.
It uses a bounded range, and a progression across that range, to define
a set of steps. A model is trained and tested at each step.
The position along the axis is calculated as the sum of _boundBegin
and _progression's current value. When this sum is greather than _boundEnd, the axis is complete.

Constructor

new Axis(_typeEnum, _boundBegin, _boundEnd, _progression)

Creates an instance of Axis.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_typeEnum number The parameter to manage. @see Types
_boundBegin number The start of the search range, inclusive.
_boundEnd number The end of the search range, inclusive.
_progression Progression Provides a set of offsets used to determine the steps in the range.
Source:
  • lib/Axis.js, line 18
Example
// create an axis for the hyperparameter 'batch size', with a range of {8, 12, 16}
new tngs.Axis(tngs.AxisTypes.BATCH_SIZE,
              8,
              16,
              new tngs.LinearProgression(4))

Advance()

Moves the progression to its next position.

CalculatePosition() → {number}

Returns the current value of this axis, defined as (_boundBegin +
_progression.value).
